body_html: @Stonesjtu For about 100MB of broadcast across two nodes, I did a rough perf evaluation, a single broadcast vs the original many broadcasts, we can nearly double the performance. 0.0268 sec (with 1 coalesced b-cast) vs 0.0436 sec (with the original logic).
body_text: @Stonesjtu For about 100MB of broadcast across two nodes, I did a rough perf evaluation, a single broadcast vs the original many broadcasts, we can nearly double the performance.  0.0268 sec (with 1 coalesced b-cast) vs 0.0436 sec (with the original logic).
body: @Stonesjtu For about 100MB of broadcast across two nodes, I did a rough perf evaluation, a single broadcast vs the original many broadcasts, we can nearly double the performance.  0.0268 sec (with 1 coalesced b-cast) vs 0.0436 sec (with the original logic).
